description: Manage and configure Azure Firewall NAT rules.

commands.name: az network firewall nat-rule create
commands.summary: Create an Azure Firewall NAT rule.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall nat-rule create --collection-name
                                    --dest-addr
                                    --destination-ports
                                    --firewall-name
                                    --name
                                    --protocols {Any, ICMP, TCP, UDP}
                                    --resource-group
                                    --translated-port
                                    [--action {Dnat, Snat}]
                                    [--description]
                                    [--priority]
                                    [--source-addresses]
                                    [--source-ip-groups]
                                    [--translated-address]
                                    [--translated-fqdn]

commands.name: az network firewall nat-rule delete
commands.summary: Delete an Azure Firewall NAT rule.

commands.name: az network firewall nat-rule show
commands.summary: Get the details of an Azure Firewall NAT rule.
